actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts and Intellectual Property.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Intellectual Property

official_title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for an additional place of holding court for the Western Division of the Central Judicial District of California.

summary.text: Amends the Federal judicial code to provide for an additional place of holding court for the Western Division of the Central Judicial District of California in Santa Barbara.

titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for an additional place of holding court for the Western Division of the Central Judicial District of California.
